newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c. bank crown/dollar fix at 30.419 (30.405).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c. bank crown/dollar fix at 30.419 (30.405).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 30.419 to the dollar after Wednesday's fixing at 30.405, and at 20.501 to the mark from 20.473.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT) and is within plus/minus 5.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at 11:30:00 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of +0.20 percent compared with a deviation of +0.30 percent on Wednesday.
